mapper.select: SELECT SNSBOARD_SEQ AS snsboardSeq, SNSBOARD_SUBJECT AS snsboardSubject, SNSBOARD_CONTENT AS snsboardContent, SNSBOARD_REGDATE AS snsboardRegdate, SNSBOARD_BLIND AS snsboardBlind, SNSBOARD_STAT AS snsboardStat, USER_EMAIL_ID_FK AS userEmailIdFk , CATEGORY_SEQ_FK AS categorySeqFk FROM SNSBOARD ORDER BY SNSBOARD_SEQ DESC LIMIT 0 ,5;
